rule.name: SS_AttachmentsGrid
rule.description: Component interface that returns a grid of attachments for a Sim-SND record [Document Management]
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!oldAttachments: a!refreshVariable( value: if( or(isnull(ri!documents), count(ri!documents) < 1), 0, length(ri!documents) ), refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false ), { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayout"( height: "SHORT", label: "Attachments", rowHeader: 1, showWhen: or(not(ri!readOnly), and(not(isnull(ri!documents)), count(ri!documents) > 0)), emptyGridMessage: "No files have been attached to this record", headerCells: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutHeaderCell"(label: "File"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutHeaderCell"(label: "Uploaded On", align: "RIGHT"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutHeaderCell"(showWhen: or(isnull(ri!readOnly), not(ri!readOnly))) }, columnConfigs: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumnConfig"(weight: 7), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumnConfig"(weight: 3), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumnConfig"(width: "ICON", showWhen: or(isnull(ri!readOnly), not(ri!readOnly))) }, rows: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!documents, expression: #"_a-0000e48b-4cb4-8000-9baf-011c48011c48_3412288"( attachment: fv!item, attachments: ri!documents, deletedAttachments: ri!deletedDocuments, index: fv!index, readOnly: ri!readOnly, oldAttachments: local!oldAttachments, target: ri!target ) ), addRowLink: if( ri!readOnly, null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"( label: "Attach New File", value: todocument(null), saveInto: a!save(ri!documents, append(ri!documents, save!value)) ) ) ) } )
